page.title: 13AROUND GARFORTH
page.content: Garforth is a village that is growing into a small town. Lots of people come to live here because it is conveniently placed for travelling by road and rail to Leeds, Castleford, York etc. Garforth could do with a hospital, sports centre and swimming pool. There is one main thoroughfare in Garforth called Main Street. There are shops on both sides of the road. The police station, fire station, doctor and medical centre are all centrally placed in Garforth. There is also a squash court, tennis courts, cricket field and rugby field. There are lots of pubs in Garforth, mostly near Main Street where a lot of vandalism is done. Many housing estates have been built in Garforth in the last twenty years, containing both private and coucil houses.
